Articles.Content:
Hello folks.

I have been heavily using the imgur album feature in my dev/release threads; but I was unable to do something I wanted to do. Namely, I wanted to wrap pretty much all albums in a spoiler tag to reduce the first post size. However, I discovered that the title and description of the first image in the album are elided if the imgur tag is underneath a spoiler tag.

Example:

UPCOMING FEATURES

Javascript is disabled. View full album

versus the same thing, with the album hidden at the start:

UPCOMING FEATURES

Javascript is disabled. View full album

It is just the description text for the first image which is elided (and only temporarily -- if you go to the next, and then back to the previous image, the text reappears).

Can someone figure out if this is on the KSP forum side or the imgur album side, and/or if anything can be done to fix it?
Not sure. I'd suspect it's on the Imgur side, though, since nothing in the spoiler tag code actually modifies anything contained within it. It just hides it.
I can't see any difference, I am on mobile though so that might make a difference.

Works for me, chrome PC. RHYME!

Aha. Works in Chromium in Linux, but not Firefox.

Weird.
